user.title: Add Drinkaware Account
user.description: Enter a name for this Drinkaware account to identify it in Home Assistant.

auth_method.title: OAuth Authentication
auth_method.description: The Drinkaware integration uses OAuth for authentication.

oauth_auth.title: Authorize Drinkaware
oauth_auth.description:
1. Click the link below to log in to your Drinkaware account:

{auth_url}

2. After logging in, you'll be redirected to a page that won't load properly - this is normal

3. Open your browser's Developer Tools (press F12), go to the Network tab

4. Find the request with 'callback' in the name, right-click and select 'Copy URL'

5. Paste that URL in the next step

code.title: Enter Redirect URL
code.description:
Paste the URL you copied from the Network tab in Developer Tools.

It should start with 'uk.co.drinkaware.drinkaware://oauth/callback' and include a code parameter.

If you can't find it, look for a canceled/redirected request in the Network tab.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Drinkaware. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.connection_error: Could not connect to Drinkaware with the provided code.
error.no_code_in_url: Could not find authorization code in the URL. The URL should look like: uk.co.drinkaware.drinkaware://oauth/callback?state=XXXX&code=YYYY
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

abort.already_configured: This Drinkaware account is already configured in Home Assistant.
abort.oauth_error: An error occurred during the OAuth authorization process.
